transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Hi, I am facing an issue with my internet speed. Can you please look into it?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We will run a remote diagnostic and reset your connection. Please wait 5 minutes; after the reset, test your speed again. If the issue persists, we’ll investigate further.

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: I am facing the payment with my bills. Can you look into it please?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I’m sorry you’re having trouble with your bill payment. I’ve opened a support ticket (Ticket #123456) for your account and our billing team will review the payment and contact you with a resolution within the next 24 hours.
